price: 17. Alle waa Kan ku soo dejiyey Kitaabka (Qur’aanka) Xaq iyo Miisaanka (caddaaladda); mana ogid waa intaasoo Saacadda (Qiyaame) Dhowdahay?
arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنزَلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَۗ وَمَا يُدۡرِيكَ لَعَلَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ قَرِيبٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu alladhī anzala al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi wal-mīzāna wamā yud'rīka laʿalla al-sāʿata qarībun
